name: Asteroids (itch) (PhillipUP904461)
description:
This is my Asteroids remake. My first game ever, made using GameMaker Studio 2

W - Forward,      A - Left,       D - Right.       Space - Shoot,       F - Special.      Enter - Restart.

Credit to:

'Ghaz Works' and 'hundredvisionsguys' for their YT tutorials on how to code an Asteroids game.
